akn:content.akn:p:
§ 524. Enforcement of coastwise trade laws Officers and members of the Coast Guard are authorized to enforce chapter 551 of title 46. The Secretary shall establish a program for these officers and members to enforce that chapter. (Added Pub. L. 111–281, title II, § 216(a), Oct. 15, 2010, 124 Stat. 2917, § 100; renumbered § 524, Pub. L. 115–282, title I, § 105(b), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4200.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2018—Pub. L. 115–282 renumbered section 100 of this title as this section.
